author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...FERNAND BECOMES A POST-TROPICAL CYCLONE... ...THIS IS THE FINAL NHC ADVISORY...
summary: ...FERNAND BECOMES A POST-TROPICAL CYCLONE... ...THIS IS THE FINAL NHC ADVISORY... As of 9:00 AM GMT Thu Aug 28 the center of Fernand was located near 41.2, -42.9 with movement ENE at 23 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1009 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 45 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...FERNAND BECOMES A POST-TROPICAL CYCLONE... ...THIS IS THE FINAL NHC ADVISORY... As of 9:00 AM GMT Thu Aug 28 the center of Fernand was located near 41.2, -42.9 with movement ENE at 23 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1009 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 45 mph.

title: Summary - Post-Tropical Cyclone Fernand (AT1/AL062025)
